title: Spicy Bean Soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '200g chopped onion', '180g sliced carrots', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '600ml chicken stock', '2 teaspoons sugar', '450g frozen sweetcorn', '400g tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '400g tin black beans, rinsed and drained', '400g tin chopped tomatoes with basil', '400g tin chopped tomatoes, drained', '110g diced green chillies']
